sentences.english: The powder room rest area, by contrast, is a very masculine decoration.
sentences.chinese: 而女廁所休息區則恰恰相反，是非常陽剛的裝修設計。

sentences.english: The " ladies " is downstairs on the ground floor.
Winston Churchill was born in a ladies' room during a dance.
sentences.chinese: 丘吉爾出生在一個舞會的女廁所裏。

sentences.english: This is the sign of women's room. Is it funny?
sentences.chinese: 這是女廁所的標誌，很搞笑吧？

sentences.english: Excuse me, could you tell me where the ladies ' room is?
sentences.chinese: 對不起，你可以告訴我女廁在哪裏嗎？

sentences.english: A woman called Ai, who lives in the female toilets, told the Zhejiang Morning Express: "We have got used to the strong smell of urine.
sentences.chinese: 一個名叫嬡的女人住在女廁裏面，浙江早報報道說。

sentences.english: We went to wash our hands in the girl's toilet before lunch and I admitted how badly I had done.
sentences.chinese: 午飯前我們到女廁所洗手時，我承認我做得非常糟糕。
他不經意地進出女廁所。

sentences.english: They're a little scared so they would just go to female toilets with their female friends," school director Sittisak Sumonta said.
sentences.chinese: 他們有點恐懼，所以去女廁所時通常要女性朋友陪伴。

sentences.english: His this ability discovers, entered between personal fluster oneself so female lavatory.
sentences.chinese: 他這才發現，原來自己慌亂間進了女廁。

sentences.english: I heard a scream from the Lady's room;
sentences.chinese: 我聽到女廁所裏傳出一聲尖叫。

sentences.english: After six months, the artwork in the women's room will move to the men's room and vice versa .
sentences.chinese: 半年後，女廁的畫作和男廁的畫作將交換場地。

sentences.english: And that night in the ladies' room of the Rustler Steak House, he chose me.
sentences.chinese: 那一晚，在那家牛排館的女廁所裏，他選了我。

sentences.english: I thought this was the women's washroom.
sentences.chinese: 我很抱歉，我以爲這兒是女廁所。

sentences.english: Can you tell me how to get to the ladies ?
sentences.chinese: 你能告訴我怎樣去女廁嗎？

sentences.english: Colleges in Guangzhou have already enlarged women cubicles.
sentences.chinese: 廣州的各所大學已經擴大了女廁。

definition: head of a flight of stairs
lit. if it's wrong, it's wrong (idiom); to make the best after a mistake/to accept an error and adapt to it/to muddle through
lower body/euphemism for genitals/root and stem of plants
to fly into a rage out of humiliation/to be ashamed into anger (idiom)
to run around all over the place
to peep/to peek/to act as voyeur
the top/above/overhead/upwards/the top margin/above-mentioned/those higher up
shameful/scandalous/to be humiliated/to make a fool of sb or oneself/to make sb lose face
to extend one's head (out or into)/a probe/detector/search unit
